H0.text: The holiday resort of Paphos is on which Mediterranean island. Crete

H1.text: The holiday resort of Paphos is on which Mediterranean island. Corsica

H2.text: The holiday resort of Paphos is on which Mediterranean island. Sardinia

H3.text: The holiday resort of Paphos is on which Mediterranean island. Kıbrıs

A4.text: The busier international airport in the government-controlled areas of Cyprus is in Paphos.

A5.text: The island is the third largest and third most populous in the Mediterranean, after Sicily and Sardinia.
